    • Method Detail

      • onJoin

        public void onJoin(JoinEvent event)
        Description copied from class: Listener
        This is fired when anyone joins a channel the bot is in. This does nothing, but can be overridden with each CommandExecutor that is defined in the RalexBot where each will be ran sequentially.
        Overrides:
        onJoin in class Listener
